page.title: 09Shoreham Beach Infant Schl.
page.content: as a playgroup. The residential area around the school consists of many detached houses. They are occupied by old people, mostly. Most of the houses are in a poor state with chipped paint and deteriorating structures. There are few houses which are modern. Houses in general on Shoreham Beach are expensive because they are detached and quite big. On doing a survey with the residents around the school, it was discovered that the school was popular and nobody has bad feelings about it. Many people are in favour of doing fund raising for it and liked the thought of having a social evening once or twice a week for the young and old there.
